message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a special introductory price of $120.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $100, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $110?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I am still not able to pay more than $100 for the product. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $100?
